text: service: checkoutservice ,Description: This is the main backend for the 'basket' in the web interface.        It collects data about the availability of products, the best shipping service, and starts the placing order process ,Business priority: Core service, highest priority,CRM: Salesforce,PIM: Syndigo,Preferred shipper: UPS,Alternative shipper: DHL,Allowed currencies: USD,EUR,GBP,Product Manager: Otto Theo Smith ; email: otto.smith@otel.demo,Legal officer: Charlotte Lawson, ; email: charlotte.lawson@otel.demo,MuleSoft integrations: GetProduct, GetStock, GetCustomer, PostOrder
